overview:
Daniel is a user experience designer and entrepreneur, uniting both disciplines to create innovative products and services. Following lean principles in entrepreneurship and design, his work is convincing by it’s pragmatism.

Daniel started freelancing as designer at the age of 18. 2009 he founded a web design agency (gebruederheitz.de) with his brother Claudius Heitz (computer scientist). Besides, he is part of several startups in different areas: mobile (search engine for mobile apps appmeister.com), entertainment (spreading colors colored.by) and healthcare (chemotherapy management software, early stage).

Daniel loves to travel, (2009) he has been working in Kazakhstan in a development cooperation project, (2011) working as a graphic design advisor in Cambodia (web-essentials.asia), (2012) he has attended the iAccelerator incubation program in India (iaccelerator.org) and has been Mentor at Startup-Weekend Kostanai, Kazakhstan.
